concept.title: resource adapter sample
concept.shortdesc: Use the sample application to guide you through installing the resource adapter on . The sample includes an application that shows a message flow between and .

conbody.p: You can use the sample to view the steps that are required for installing and running the application. The sample also shows you how to create the objects that are needed for the application to send and receive a message.
You can download the files contained in the sample package by completing the following steps:

ol.li: Save the IBMMessageSightBetaV1.0.1_RA_Demo.zip file and extract the contents.
Open ResourceAdapterDemo.htm. This file provides the walk through instructions and the demonstration application (DemoApp.ear).
